creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Terry Welch
description: flat bank at lower center lined with boulders, with trees and small, open walled structure; tall, rounded mountain at UR; inscription ULQ
marks: ULQ: [ 予画本無宗傳 / 惟以山川為筆墨/ 似雲烟為渲染/ 幾處冩之於此/ 有餘師 ] My  ULC: [  信天翁并題 ] {Shinten’ō heidai}
title: Landscape in the Manner of Ni Zan
